Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
Here you find several subpages that are useful to handle the documentation:

  • Todos: Here you see all the TODOs that are open in the documentation
  • Screenshot reviews: Here you can check if all screenshots are up-to-date for the documentation's version, replace screenshots or simply mark them as up-to-date
  • Content sanitizers: They allow to touch each content, sanitize it and store it again. This is useful to update topic and section title properties, or if the structure of a content should have changed.
